hero.badge: For Women Wey Dey Do Business
hero.title: Make Your Business Strong
hero.subtitle: Simple, strong tools for women wey dey hustle. Track money, grow sales, build your money future.
hero.description: You dey work hard. You dey provide. You dey plan for tomorrow with the small thing wey you get today. For SheBalance, we see you. Na why we create this platform just for you — to help you take charge of your money, grow your business, and build the future wey you don always dream about.

about.title: Wetin Be SheBalance?
about.description: Na your money companion. Your quiet business partner. Your everyday reminder say you deserve more — more knowledge, more control, more confidence.

features.trackBusiness: Track Your Business, Your Own Way
features.trackBusinessDesc: Whether you dey sell for market, you dey run small shop, or you dey hustle from house, SheBalance go help you keep track of every naira. No need for big big accounting — just small tap, and you don take control.
features.builtForYou: We Build Am For You, By Women Wey Understand
features.builtForYouDesc: We design am with women like you for mind, SheBalance dey speak your language — for real. With local language options, simple icons, and voice instructions, e easy for every woman to dey use am with confidence.
features.knowNumbersDesc: No more guessing where your money don go. See wetin dey come inside, wetin dey comot, and wetin remain for save. SheBalance go show you the full picture — so you fit make better choices.
features.learnEarn: Learn As You Dey Make Money
features.learnEarnDesc: You no need classroom to grow. SheBalance dey share small, strong lessons about saving, planning, and business tips — right inside the app, as you dey use am. Every day, you dey grow strong.

whoFor.title: Who SheBalance Dey For?
whoFor.subtitle: SheBalance na for you, the woman wey:
whoFor.item1: Dey run her business with heart and hustle
whoFor.item2: Wan prepare for big big opportunities like loans and investments
whoFor.item3: Dey dream to dey organized, informed, and independent
whoFor.item4: Believe say she fit grow — with the right tools for her side

appFeatures.title: Wetin You Fit Do With SheBalance
appFeatures.getReports: Get reports wey you fit download and share
appFeatures.useOffline: Use the app offline — any time, anywhere
appFeatures.localLanguage: Enjoy support for your local language

faq.title: Questions Wey People Dey Ask
faq.subtitle: Everything wey you need to know about SheBalance
faq.a1: SheBalance na mobile platform wey we design specially for women wey dey do business make dem fit track their business money, manage inventory, join savings groups, and build money confidence. We build am with local languages and simple interfaces make money management dey easy for every woman.
faq.a2: Yes! SheBalance get free version with important features to help you start. We also get premium features for serious business needs. You fit start with the free version and upgrade when you ready.
faq.q3: I fit use SheBalance without internet?
faq.a3: Yes o! SheBalance dey work offline, so you fit track your sales and expenses even when you no get internet connection. Your data go sync when you come back online.
faq.a4: SheBalance dey support plenty local languages to make sure every woman fit use the app well well. We dey add more languages all the time based on wetin users need.
faq.a5: Your data security na our number one priority. We dey use industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect your money information. Your data na private and e dey safe.
faq.a6: Yes! You fit download and share your money reports. This one dey very useful for loan applications, business planning, or to share with family members.
faq.q7: I no sabi technology well. I fit still use am?
faq.a7: No worry! We design SheBalance to dey simple and easy to understand. We use icons wey everybody sabi, voice instructions, and step-by-step guidance make e easy for everybody to use.
faq.q8: How I go join savings group?
faq.a8: You fit join savings groups wey don dey or create your own. The app go help you track contributions, set goals, and manage group savings for transparent and secure way.

cta.title: Your Money. Your Power. Your Future.
cta.description1: For SheBalance, we believe say when woman understand her money, she dey multiply her power — for her business, her family, and her community.
cta.description2: So whether you dey buy, dey sell, dey save, or just dey start — make SheBalance walk with you.

footer.description: Dey empower women wey dey do business with simple tools to track money, grow business, and build money confidence.

newsletter.title: Stay updated
newsletter.description: Get tips and updates for your inbox.
